member.name: T:EF.ljArchive.Common.Journal
member.summary: Class for representing and manipulating a journal.
member.remarks: This is the base class that represents the ljArchive schema.

member.name: M:EF.ljArchive.Common.Journal.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: M:EF.ljArchive.Common.Journal.#ctor(System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo,System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext)
member.summary: Protected serialization constructor.

member.name: M:EF.ljArchive.Common.Journal.Clone
member.summary: Copies the structure of the System.Data.DataSet, including all System.Data.DataTable schemas, relations, and constraints. Does not copy any data.
member.returns: A new System.Data.DataSet with the same schema as the current System.Data.DataSet, but none of the data.

member.name: M:EF.ljArchive.Common.Journal.ShouldSerializeTables
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether System.Data.DataSet.Tables property should be persisted.
member.returns: true if the property value has been changed from its default; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:EF.ljArchive.Common.Journal.ShouldSerializeRelations
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether System.Data.DataSet.Relations property should be persisted.
member.returns: true if the property value has been changed from its default; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:EF.ljArchive.Common.Journal.ReadXmlSerializable(System.Xml.XmlReader)
member.summary: Custom Xml deserialization reading.

member.name: M:EF.ljArchive.Common.Journal.GetSchemaSerializable
member.summary: Gets a serializable schema.

member.name: P:EF.ljArchive.Common.Journal.Options
member.summary: Gets a collection of objects for this .

member.name: P:EF.ljArchive.Common.Journal.Events
member.summary: Gets a collection of objects for this .

member.summary: Gets a collection of objects for this .

member.summary: Gets a collection of objects for this .

member.name: T:EF.ljArchive.Common.Journal.OptionsDataTable
member.summary: A collection of objects.

remarks.para: Only one should exist in the , and should be found at index zero.

member.name: T:EF.ljArchive.Common.Journal.OptionsRow
member.summary: Livejournal options.

remarks.para: , , , and are settings the user can set for the table.
, , and are options that are retrieved from the server.

member.name: P:EF.ljArchive.Common.Journal.OptionsRow.ServerURL
member.summary: The server that this journal connects to.

remarks.para: By convention, should be stored as protocol::/hostname, such as http://www.livejournal.com
Notice the lack of a trailing forward slash.

member.name: P:EF.ljArchive.Common.Journal.OptionsRow.DefaultPicURL
member.summary: The default icon URL for this journal.
member.remarks: This option is set by the server.

member.name: P:EF.ljArchive.Common.Journal.OptionsRow.FullName
member.summary: The full name of the user of this .
member.remarks: This option is set by the server.

member.name: P:EF.ljArchive.Common.Journal.OptionsRow.UserName
member.summary: The user name for this .

member.name: P:EF.ljArchive.Common.Journal.OptionsRow.HPassword
member.summary: The MD5-hashed password for this .
member.remarks: For security, the password is NOT stored as plain-text.

member.name: P:EF.ljArchive.Common.Journal.OptionsRow.LastSync
member.summary: The date the was last synchronized with the server.

member.name: P:EF.ljArchive.Common.Journal.OptionsRow.GetComments
member.summary: If true, will try to download comments for this .

member.name: T:EF.ljArchive.Common.Journal.EventsDataTable
member.summary: A collection of objects.

member.name: T:EF.ljArchive.Common.Journal.EventsRow
member.summary: An event.

remarks.para: This contains all the information of a livejournal entry.
In livejournal development parlance, it's called an event.
To see the source of this schema, visit the livejournal doc on events.
Also see the livejournal doc on meta-data.

member.name: P:EF.ljArchive.Common.Journal.EventsRow.ID
member.summary: Gets/sets the unique integer ID of the .

member.name: P:EF.ljArchive.Common.Journal.EventsRow.Date
member.summary: Gets/sets the time the user posted (or said they posted, rather, since users can back-date posts) the .

member.name: P:EF.ljArchive.Common.Journal.EventsRow.Security
member.summary: Gets/sets the security of this .
member.remarks: If null then the is public, otherwise this value will be private or usemask.

member.name: P:EF.ljArchive.Common.Journal.EventsRow.AllowMask
member.summary: Gets/sets the 32-bit unsigned int bit-mask of who is allowed to access this post.

member.name: P:EF.ljArchive.Common.Journal.EventsRow.Subject
member.summary: Gets/sets the subject of this .

member.name: P:EF.ljArchive.Common.Journal.EventsRow.Body
member.summary: Gets/sets the event text itself.

member.name: P:EF.ljArchive.Common.Journal.EventsRow.Poster
member.summary: Gets/sets the username of the poster of this .
member.remarks: If null, then it is safe to assume that the poster of this is none other than the user.

member.name: P:EF.ljArchive.Common.Journal.EventsRow.CurrentMood
member.summary: Gets/sets the current mood of the .

member.name: P:EF.ljArchive.Common.Journal.EventsRow.CurrentMoodID
member.summary: Gets/sets the current mood ID.
member.remarks: If set, this number will correspond to an ID in the .

member.name: P:EF.ljArchive.Common.Journal.EventsRow.CurrentMusic
member.summary: Gets/sets the current music.

member.name: P:EF.ljArchive.Common.Journal.EventsRow.Preformatted
member.summary: Gets/sets if the contains HTML and shouldn't be formatted

member.name: P:EF.ljArchive.Common.Journal.EventsRow.NoComments
member.summary: Gets/sets if readers can't comment on this entry.

member.name: P:EF.ljArchive.Common.Journal.EventsRow.PictureKeyword
member.summary: Gets/sets the keyword that aligns to a defined picture.
member.remarks: This keyword may correspond to a in the .

member.name: P:EF.ljArchive.Common.Journal.EventsRow.Backdated
member.summary: Gets/sets if this item shouldn't show up on people's friends lists (because it occurred in the past).

member.name: P:EF.ljArchive.Common.Journal.EventsRow.NoEmail
member.summary: Gets/sets if the poster isn't interested in receiving comments to this post by email.

member.name: P:EF.ljArchive.Common.Journal.EventsRow.Unknown8Bit
member.summary: Gets/sets if text has 8-bit data that's not in UTF-8.

member.name: P:EF.ljArchive.Common.Journal.EventsRow.ScreenedComments
member.summary: Gets/sets if comments to this item include screened comments.

member.name: P:EF.ljArchive.Common.Journal.EventsRow.NumberOfRevisions
member.summary: Gets/sets number of times the post has been edited.

member.name: P:EF.ljArchive.Common.Journal.EventsRow.CommentAlter
member.summary: Gets/sets the unix time of the last change to number of comments to this post.

member.name: P:EF.ljArchive.Common.Journal.EventsRow.SyndicationURL
member.summary: Gets/sets the original URL of syndication item.

member.name: P:EF.ljArchive.Common.Journal.EventsRow.SyndicationID
member.summary: Gets/sets the unique id of syndication item.

member.name: P:EF.ljArchive.Common.Journal.EventsRow.LastRevision
member.summary: Gets/sets the time of last edit.

member.name: P:EF.ljArchive.Common.Journal.EventsRow.TagList
member.summary: Gets/sets the list of tags on this .
member.remarks: If null, then there are no tags on this yet (or possibly the server doesn't support tags yet).

member.name: T:EF.ljArchive.Common.Journal.UserPicsDataTable
member.summary: A collection of objects.

member.name: T:EF.ljArchive.Common.Journal.UserPicsRow
member.summary: A user picture.

remarks.para: User pictures downloaded from the server only represent the current selection of icons the user has.
Many objects may exist in the with values that don't correspond to a . Bummer.

member.name: P:EF.ljArchive.Common.Journal.UserPicsRow.PicKeyword
member.summary: Gets/sets the picture keyword.

member.name: P:EF.ljArchive.Common.Journal.UserPicsRow.PicURL
member.summary: Gets/sets the picture URL.

member.name: T:EF.ljArchive.Common.Journal.MoodsDataTable
member.summary: A collection of objects.

member.name: T:EF.ljArchive.Common.Journal.MoodsRow
member.summary: A mood.

remarks.para: Moods are downloaded from the server upon logging in.
Many objects may exist in the with values that correspond to a . Awesome.

member.name: P:EF.ljArchive.Common.Journal.MoodsRow.ID
member.summary: Gets/sets the Mood ID.

member.name: P:EF.ljArchive.Common.Journal.MoodsRow.Name
member.summary: The mood name.

member.name: P:EF.ljArchive.Common.Journal.MoodsRow.Parent
member.summary: The mood's parent (base) Mood ID.

remarks.para: I think this is used for common mood icons.
Or maybe it's some profound treatise regarding the taxonomy of human emotion.

member.name: T:EF.ljArchive.Common.Journal.CommentsDataTable
member.summary: A collection of objects.

member.name: T:EF.ljArchive.Common.Journal.CommentsRow
member.summary: A comment.

remarks.para: To see the source of this schema, visit the livejournal doc on comments.

member.name: P:EF.ljArchive.Common.Journal.CommentsRow.ID
member.summary: Gets/sets the id of this particular comment.

member.name: P:EF.ljArchive.Common.Journal.CommentsRow.PosterID
member.summary: Gets/sets the ID of the poster of this comment.

remarks.para: This ID should ALWAYS correspond to a in the .
An ID of 0 (zero) means anonymous.

member.name: P:EF.ljArchive.Common.Journal.CommentsRow.State
member.summary: Gets/sets the state of this comment.

remarks.para: S = screened comment, D = deleted comment, A = active (visible) comment. If null, it is assumed to be A.
If the comment is deleted, it will have no relevant info besides the and the .

member.name: P:EF.ljArchive.Common.Journal.CommentsRow.JItemID
member.summary: Gets/sets the this comment was posted in.

member.name: P:EF.ljArchive.Common.Journal.CommentsRow.ParentID
member.summary: Gets/sets the ID of the parent in the thread.
member.remarks: Top level comments have this property marked as 0 (zero).

member.name: P:EF.ljArchive.Common.Journal.CommentsRow.Body
member.summary: Gets/sets the text of the comment.

member.name: P:EF.ljArchive.Common.Journal.CommentsRow.Subject
member.summary: Gets/sets the subject of the comment.

member.name: P:EF.ljArchive.Common.Journal.CommentsRow.Date
member.summary: Gets/sets the date of the comment.

member.name: T:EF.ljArchive.Common.Journal.UsersDataTable
member.summary: A collection of objects.

member.name: T:EF.ljArchive.Common.Journal.UsersRow
member.summary: A livejournal user.

remarks.para: User names can be changed, but the user ID should always remain the same.
(In theory, right.)

member.name: P:EF.ljArchive.Common.Journal.UsersRow.ID
member.summary: Gets/sets the ID of this user.

member.name: P:EF.ljArchive.Common.Journal.UsersRow.User
member.summary: Gets/sets the user name of this user.
